get.summary: Retrieve a single blog post by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the blog post to retrieve

body.description: Body content of the blog post
body.example: This is the body of the blog post.

blog_image.description: URL of the blog post image

created_at.description: Timestamp when the blog post was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the blog post was last updated

created_at.description: Timestamp when the blog category was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the blog category was last updated

from.description: First item on the current page

to.description: Last item on the current page

active.description: Whether the pagination link is active

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

from.description: First item on the current page

to.description: Last item on the current page

active.description: Whether the pagination link is active
